3.post_text:
Craving a Coca-Cola as you enjoy your afternoon meals? Or looking to perk up your afternoon with an ice-cold Coca-Cola? 

Well, every time you drink a bottle of Coca-Cola, you just might win an awesome prize! In the month of March and April, we’ll be giving out prizes EVERYDAY! 

All you need to do is follow these 3 easy steps!

1) Get a bottle of Coca-Cola or our participating brands (with a yellow cap)
2) Look under the bottle cap for unique 10-digit code
3) Enter your Code into CokeURL.com/OpenToWin OR send an 
SMS to 76677: COKE<space>Name<space>Code 

What are you waiting for? Get a Coca-Cola now to WIN! 

Promotion ends 30th April. For T&Cs and more details visit: CokeURL.com/OpenToWin

#CocaColaSG

4.post_text:
HAPPY INTERNATIONAL WOMEN’S DAY!!! 

A day worth celebrating the women in our lives and the roles they play in our everyday lives. Well, actually everyday is a day to celebrate! =) 

Since 2010, we’ve helped over 1.2 million women across the globe by providing them with an enabling environment to achieve economic empowerment. By 2020, we hope to expand that that number to 5 million women entrepreneurs across our value chain.

Visit www.5by20.com to know more. 

#5by20 #IWD #GirlPowerEveryday

20.post_text:
The Coca-Cola Recycle Happiness Machine was spotted at Raffles City Shopping Centre over the weekend and will be back the Christmas weekend of the 24th and 25th!

Besides checking out the Christmas display made from upcycled Coca-Cola bottles at Raffles City Shopping Centre, don’t forget to bring down and recycle your bottles at the machine. CapitaLand Hope Foundation will also be donating $2 to Community Chest for every bottle recycled by the public, up to a total amount of $25,000. The funds raised will go towards supporting Rainbow Centre (Margaret Drive), a school that caters to children in Singapore with diverse special needs.

Once again, do your part of the environment and Rainbow Centre by recycling your bottles this festive season!

#CocaColaRecyclingWonderland #CocaColaSG #RafflesCity
20.story: Coca-Cola is at Raffles City Singapore.

22.post_text:
In addition to the Christmas display made from upcycled Coca-Cola bottles, the popular Coca-Cola Recycle Happiness machine will be back at Lot One Shoppers’ Mall on 17 & 18 December! CapitaLand Hope Foundation will also be making a $2 donation to Community Chest-supported Rainbow Centre (Margaret Drive), a special education school, for every bottle recycled at the machine, up to a maximum of S$25,000, so bring your bottles down and recycle! 
 
From now till 25 December, you can also win attractive prizes when you guess the number of upcycled bottles used in the display below at Lot One. Simply leave a comment with the hashtag #CocaColaRecyclingWonderland on this post and three winners with the closest guess can stand a chance to win Limited Edition Coca-Cola premiums made from recycled bottles and $20 CapitaVoucher!
 
#CocaColaRecyclingWonderland #CocaColaSG #LotOne
22.story: Coca-Cola is at Lot One Shopper's Mall.

comments.message: Uyangaa Cooper

23.post_text:
One of this year’s hottest food trends – gooey, stringy melted cheese, goes well with everything! 

Here’s the popular spicy Korean rice cake, Tteokbokki – covered with a creamy layer of melted cheese, and thrown into a deep rich spicy stew. Pair it with a fizzy can of #IceCold #Coke zero and you’re all set! 

#CocaColaSG #LocalfavouriteWithCoke #TteokbokkiWithCoke #MeltedCheeseWithCoke

comments.message: sinful but nice!

24.post_text:
Check out this huge plate of Alvinology's Nasi Ambeng, a traditional Indonesian food dish best for sharing with your loved ones! 

Savour this mouth-watering sharing platter and dig into a medley of spices while enjoying a refreshing can of #Coke!

#Cokewithfood #NasiAmbeng #CocaColaSG #foodie #instafood #pu3restaurant #halalfood #TLMeat #alvinology #sp
